articles.title: Asian shares rise as China cuts key mortgage rate - Reuters
articles.description: Asian share markets broke a five-day slide to edge higher on Thursday, shrugging off drops in Europe and on Wall Street overnight as China underscored its diverging monetary and economic picture by cutting benchmark mortgage rates.
